relation: Great for these types of students
It helps to be outgoing and talkative. With Experience One, you will be in groups and your teacher will act as a facilitator instead of a dictator.
Take advantage of LACE. They will help you study for tests, read your papers, and give you tips for your classes.
It is cheaper than the two main colleges in Montana.
It is a beautiful campus in a beautiful setting.
The teachers are wonderful, and really make you think deeper than normal.
pageTitle: The University of Montana-Western Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
textBeforeTable: 09/25/2009 Reviewer is Researching this school. Reviewer has not been to campus. 6 out of 6 people found this review useful. 1 of 15 lauren from Rochester, MN Check out reviews left by other students or leave your own review. textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews amy from Bigfork, MT 12/07/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 5 out of 5 people found this review useful. 2 of 15 Categories Comments Great for these types of students its a great school where you know almost everyone and can focus on one thing at a time instead of 4 different classes each week. Tips for prospective students ask professors for help, that's what they are there for. don't close yourself off be brave and make new friends. Bang for the buck its cheaper then some of the other colleges and helps you learn things at a slight faster pase. But also helps your grades Am enjoying being here Its a small university and a small town, iv made some great friends and the Professors are great. Am learning a lot
